title: Antique updates

properties.name: description
properties.value: Antique updates are updates that Jagex has mentioned or previously posted, but have since been removed from the RuneScape site. Most of these updates are from the very early days.

content:
Antique updates are updates that Jagex has mentioned or previously posted, but have since been removed from the RuneScape site. Most of these updates are from the very early days.

Contents

  • 1 Chronological list of updates
    • 1.1 2007
    • 1.2 2005
    • 1.3 2004
    • 1.4 2003
    • 1.5 2002
    • 1.6 2001
    • 1.7 2000
  • 2 Sources

Chronological list of updates[edit | edit source]

The updates are listed most recent at top. For an alphabetical list, see Category:Antique updates.

2007[edit | edit source]

  • 9 August - Website Maintenance
  • 1 August - Behind the Scenes - August (2007)
  • 1 April - April Fools

2005[edit | edit source]

  • 3 August - RuneScape Classic is no longer available to free users

2004[edit | edit source]

  • 27 October - RuneScape Classic mass ban
  • 2 January - Happy new year from Jagex

2003[edit | edit source]

  • 2 November - More Scythes dropping today
  • 31 October - Halloween Drop
  • 20 April - Happy Easter
  • 7 February - Parlez-vous Runescape?
  • 6 February - Learning can be fun...
  • 4 February - Attention all budding scribes!
  • 29 January - Runescape romance turns real
  • 29 January - In low HP, and in health
  • 23 January - Wedding bells at Jagex!
  • 14 January - REDACTED[1]
  1. ↑ This newspost was removed from Jagex's archive and on this wiki for privacy reasons.
